headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Discounts
content:
Those thinking of taking things a little further underground can take 40% off the cost of all Facilities and their Upgrades and Modifications this week, not to mention there’s discounts on a range of top-of-the-line vehicles both weaponized and not:

- Declasse Scramjet – 35% off
- Pegassi Infernus Classic – 40% off
- Överflöd Imorgon – 40% off
- X80 Proto – 40% off

And more! Check out the Rockstar Newswire for more details.
